page.title: 17HOLIDAYS IN STOKE FLEMING
page.content: Thousands of people spend their holidays in{Stoke Fleming}each summer. There are two{Inns,}two{Hotels}and many{Bed and Breakfast}houses. Most people stay on the{camp sites}at Leonard's Cove and Deer Park. On each site there are{caravans}and{chalets plus areas for{tents.}Also in the village are many{Holiday Cottages which are rented for the summer and are then empty in the winter. One of the attractions of Stoke Fleming is{Blackpool Sands,}a beach at the foot of the hill popular because the sun shines into it for most of the day. A little stream flows out onto the beach. Around the village is beautiful{scenery}and many visitors come year after year.
